version_description:
As many of you requested we've added the Native remote mode with "Menu" button.
Now you can use the Menu Button to go back or to home screen just like with native remote.
You can switch to previous tap-control CiderTV mode at any time too

Rolling this out on CiderTV Pro first, then on freemium app version.

The support for x+ devices is added.

Rolling this out on CiderTV Pro first, then on freemium app version.
